content: I'm particularly interested in the utility chic trend. Can you show me some examples of clothing items that fit this style, like cargo pants and jackets with functional details? Also, I'm curious, how can I incorporate this trend into my everyday wardrobe without looking like I'm going on a hike? By the way, I was thinking about the first time I wore sneakers after switching out my winter boots, and I felt so carefree and ready for spring.
